name: Cancer Today
desc: Presents national estimates of the incidence, mortality,and prevalence of 36 cancer types in 185 countries, by sex and age group for the year 2020.

name: Cancer Over Time
desc: Presents time trends of cancer incidence and mortality over the course of over half a century, based on high-quality data from 60 countries.

name: Cancer Tomorrow
desc: Predicts the future cancer incidence and mortality burden worldwide up until 2040.

name: Cancer incidence in five continents (CI5)
desc: High-quality cancer incidence data compiled from population-based cancer registries (regional and national) around the world.

name: NORDCAN
desc: Comparable cancer statistics for Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, Sweden, the Faroe Islands, and Greenland

name: ACCIS
desc: The Automated Childhood Cancer Information System

name: IICC
desc: International Incidence of Childhood Cancer.

name: CRICCS
desc: Cancer Risk in Childhood Cancer Survivors

name: ICCC
desc: International Classification of Childhood Cancer

name: Cancer attributable to obesity
desc: Presents the estimated global burden of cancer attributable to excess body weight in 2012.

name: Cancer attributable to infections
desc: Presents the estimated global cancer incidence in 2012 attributable to ultraviolet (UV) radiation exposure.

name: Cancer attributable to UV
desc: An interactive tools for analysing and visualizing data on the estimated global cancer incidence in 2012 attributable to ultraviolet (UV) radiation exposure.

name: Cancer attributable to Alcohol
desc: An interactive tools for analysing and visualizing data on the estimated global cancer incidence in 2020 attributable to alcohol.

name: GICR
desc: The Global Initiative for Cancer Registry Development

name: ChildGICR
desc: Targeting Childhood Cancer through the Global Initiative for Cancer Registry Development

name: IACR
desc: The International Association of Cancer Registries

name: CIN Portal
desc: The Registries Portal at IARC

name: SURVCAN
desc: Cancer Survival in Countries in Transition

name: SURVMARK
desc: Cancer Survival in High-Income Countries

name: SURVPOOL
desc: A Consortium on Risk Factors and Cancer Survival

name: ICBP-2 SURVMARK
desc: Interactive tools for analysing and visualizing data on the estimated population-based cancer survival from specific cancer type.

name: ICD-O-3
desc: The International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (ICD-O-3)

name: ICD-10
desc: The International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, 10th Revision

name: CanReg5
desc: Operational software for population-based cancer registries

name: Cancer in Central and South America Project
desc: Collaboration between the Branch of Cancer Surveillance of IARC, the Red de Institutos e Instituciones Nacionales de CÃ¡ncer (RINC) and cancer registries in the Central and South American region.

name: Causes du Cancer en France, en 2015
desc: Estimates the number of new cases attributable to the major risk factors in France in 2015.

name: Global burden of gastrointestinal cancers
desc: Gastrointestinal (GI) cancers account for 1 in 4 cancer cases and 1 in 3 cancer deaths globally. There is considerable variation in incidence and mortality rates across the world.

name: Infographics
desc: An expanding set of infographics built with infogram.
